task: Add a word to the dictionary
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' section, click on 'Spelling & Grammar'.
The 'Spelling and Grammar' pane will appear on the right side of the document.
Right-click on the word that you want to add to the dictionary.
From the context menu, select 'Add to Dictionary'.
The word will be added to the dictionary and will no longer be flagged as misspelled.
